name: Elephant & Castle
notes:
Perfect amount of ice
Kind of just tastes like Sprite
Upon refill I received two cherries, but I'm not giving points for this

name: Crystal Creek Cafe
notes:
American classic
There is also a Roy Rogers on the menu, I respect the classics
Perfect balance of sprite and grenadine
Can't name any specific flaws, but it's not quite a 10. I'll know a ten when I see one.

name: Red Robin
notes:
Red Robin is the armpit of the world
Lacking in grenadine, but not enough to make it taste like just Sprite, more of an awkward flavorless middleground.

name: Pizza Bank
notes:
First one had hair in it but they brought me a new one
Too much grenadine
Decent enough

name: George's
notes:
Medicore presentation
Had a cute date (Ella)
Something was missing, overall weird energy

name: Lake Forest Park Bar and Grill
notes:
Good balance of grenadine and sprite
Cute date (Guinevere)
Felt bad because the waitress seemed annoyed we only ordered Shirley Temples... what're you gonna do though

name: Malibu Diner
notes:
Too much grenadine
No ice???
The lack of ice genuinely throws this whole thing off... a Shirley Temple should never be room temp.
Music is restaurant was annoying
No cute date :(

name: Joe & Pat's
notes:
Way too small of a cup
Great presentation, cherry was hung neatly on the rim of the cup
The little straw was insulting frankly

name: The New School Cafeteria
notes:
Never had a bottled Shirley before so points for originality
This literally just tastes like Coca-Cola
No cherry obviously
Every drink with "real cane sugar" just tastes the same
Will not buy a second time

name: DIY Shirley Temple in a Bear Cup
notes:
I made this one in my favorite cup
Great presentation
Perfect balance of grenadine and sprite, because I made it
Couldn't fit a cherry in the lid :(

name: Custom House
notes:
Little bit grenadine heavy
Table mate somehow spilled ketchup in my mine glass so I really only got to enjoy half of this
Not the best, but not bad

name: Applebee's Time Square
notes:
Waiter was very nice
Good balance of grenadine and sprite
This is an Applebee's so the quality ceiling is pretty low
Overall pleasant

name: Cafe Veloce
notes:
Waiter was very nice
Good atmosphere in restaurant
I got a refill and that one was like 99% grenadine unfortunately. But I judge on the initial glass!

name: Woodinville Cafe
notes:
This was right after I got my wisdom teeth out and I swear to god this Shirley Temple flowed into the wounds like healing nectar and fixed them right up
Cherries were weirdly stringy and one of them was split in half
Great ice to drink ratio

name: Georgia Queen River Boat Cruise
notes:
I watched the guy make this and frankly it was like a horror movie
He did half Sprite, half WATER and then a pathetic amount of grenadine
So watery and gross
Two cherries though!
I would give this a lower score but it was free

name: Fish Casual Coaster Seafood
notes:
Way too much grenadine
B+Presentation sucks
Restaurant had a weird odor
They're lucky I like the taste of grenadine by itself because otherwise this would be a 0

name: Char Bar
notes:
Appropriately sized
Good balance of Sprite and grenadine

name: La Palapa Cocina Mexicana
notes:
I kept embarrassing myself in front of the waitress
Good presentation
Not nearly enough grenadine in this one

name: Plaza Garcia
notes:
This was solid and very delicious
Free refills!
I did not know there could be too many cherries in a Shirley Temple but 5 was a little bit overkill... at what point are they an appetizer
Overall great

name: Yard House
notes:
I got this for free and it had 5 cherries in it so automatic 10
I felt very cool and whimsical drinking this on the subway home
I then had to pee really bad when I got home

name: Bar Mexicana
notes:
In terms of flavor this was an absolute 10
Unfortunately the dining experience was so terrible I have to give it a 9
$50 for tiny plates... QR code menu... I hated it
What Mexican place brings the chips and salsa LAST

name: The Grey Dog
notes:
This pissed me off
There was a lime on the rim which was nice but it also tasted like they had pouredl ike half a cup of lime juice in it
Somehow it was also watery
Not cheap

name: Friedman's
notes:
Really good at the beginning, but wasn't mixed well so by the end I was basically just drinking club soda
Felt judged by the waiter since it was Thanksgiving and I didn't get wine or gravy to drink or something
I was so exhausted when I drank this its possible my vibe just made it taste bad

name: Poster House Bar
notes:
He made this special for me and it was free so I have to give it a five
But it was so bad
So much grenadine in this it was literally crazy
WHY DID I GET A REFILL
Made Chris 'take a step back'
Very syrupy

name: Cheescake Factory
notes:
Took forever but it's ok bc they were so busy
Waiter was very nice
3 cherries hell yeah
Too much grenadine unfortunately
